content.detailedDescription: In sebring fl witch is not to far from the avon park air force base i would observe f 15 flying around in the daytime probably doing training exercises to me it was always cool to watch i am always looking towards the skys anyways day or night. i work late nights at a restaurant and when i get off i like to go outside and look at the stars then 1 star caught my eye because this star was hauling butt and it wasn't a plane to the half ass it was moving and how fast it slow down and change direction i'm not know playing expert but i look up at the stars and the sky a lot and the first night when i seen don't start moving like that i knew it couldn't be a plane cause plains cant travel that high up and change direction like it did. so then the next night i go outside again when i get off work and it is around 1 130 in the morning i see it again this time its not alone there was another one not too far from it toward the side so i'm watching and here in the distance fighter jets i look back up again and i see you after 1 the other two basically look like they slowed down and then stopped in mid air and the other one was coming towards those two and as if i were just got closer all three of those star looking things change directions again moving together away from the fighter jets and i'm used to seeing in the daytime at least 2 to 4 fighter jets training i counted six fighter jets that night and like i said avon park air force base was not too far from my house and sebring so for whoever read this find this interesting my suggestion to you cuz i would love to investigate it if i could go investigate avon park air force base area if you go i would love to go with you. thank you
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It wasnt the first time i saw this happen. is was a few nights. and every time i saw them there were fighter jets in the area or seems like they were chasing them and it would some times go on for a few hours

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunately, i am submitting this about 6 years after the short event occurred.  the reason i'm submitting this is because i recently discovered mufon.  considering this event happened at my house when i was a kid, everybody i tell now still doesn't believe me.  my mother hardly did when i finally told her months after it happened.  i was so afraid of what i saw at the time, as my first ufo encounter was worryingly close; i decided i'd submit something before it makes me go crazy or i make myself forget what i saw.

anyway, if i remember correctly, it was november of 2009 (sadly, i can't remember the exact day), i was 12 years old, and i was up late watching television in my bedroom in my home in fairbanks ranch in rancho santa fe, california.  yes, the same neighborhood where the heaven's gate suicides occurred in 1997.  at around 2:00am pst, i decided that it was alright for me to get a late-night snack, even though i had no business being up so late. my mother was asleep in her bedroom, on the other side of the house.  i calmly left my bedroom, walked down the hallway, passing the open family room, and almost getting into the main kitchen. from where i stood in the hallway, i could see into another part of the house past the kitchen - a living room with a west-facing french door.  i just froze.  outside the french door, i saw what seemed to be the outer edge of a huge, bright blue light, which slowly, and silently, faded into itself.  i was about 50 feet away from the door, with the light an unknown distance outside, down the hill.  the edge of the light itself reached the height of the left door before it faded into itself.  at the time i saw the light, it didn't move, it didn't fly away, it just faded into whatever source was creating it.  i don't know where the object or light came from - i didn't witness it descending or coming from anywhere in the valley beyond the house.

the very first thing that i thought i was seeing was colored spots in my vision from looking into lights on the ceiling.  i thought it had to be something i was making up, or a visual issue.  but, as the light faded, i saw where it was roughly situated.  it was clearly behind a mound of dirt that was outside the door, and it was very clear that it was truly outside and somewhere down the hill below.  unlike colored spots in my vision, it faded at a steady speed, and didn't move when my eyes did.  so, i instantly realized i wasn't just seeing spots or random colors.  mentally, i remember being terrified after i understood that i saw something i really couldn't explain.  i stood there completely still, staring at the door, until the light was gone, looked away, looked back, and confirmed that it wasn't there anymore.  i remember talking to myself and saying, "never mind, i don't need a snack tonight, i'll just go to bed.  yeah, the snack can wait."  i ran back to my room and forced myself to sleep, and honestly tried to forget that i even saw anything, thinking nobody would believe me.

when i brought it to my mother's attention later on, she asked me why i hadn't gone to her earlier.  i told her i was too afraid, and i remember her giving me a look as if she was saying, "don't be ridiculous."  she tried to explain the event away.  she said it could have been headlights, or somebody outside with a blue flashlight.  but both of those are impossible.  the neighborhood is gated, so nobody could have walked onto the property from the front.  the light was beyond too steady for a flashlight; people's hands shake too much, and no flashlight in existence that i have seen is blue and turns off in a perfect fade.  it couldn't have been headlights, even though there is a road at the bottom of the hill.  but that's the problem - from where i stood, the road was way too far below me for the light to be from somebody's crazy blue headlights.  a car would have had to be driven up the property, and that's impossible due to how steep the hill is.  it couldn't have been work lights from the bulldozer drivers who began work on the back yard that year, because the neighborhood hoa doesn't allow them to work at night.  it couldn't be any kind of man-made light, because the property is just too big for somebody to be running around setting up lights to scare kids.

even now, i have trouble putting exactly what i saw into words.  unfortunately, the source of the light was obstructed by me being above it in elevation, relative to the hill the house itself is on.  only a slice of it was visible through the glass doors, but the 1/4 of it was large enough to reach the height of the left glass door, as stated earlier.  the light could have been just an orb, or it could have come from a small ship, but i don't know for sure.  what i can describe is how strange it was to see the light fade into its own source.  the closest comparison i have is if somebody had pointed a concert light upwards at the house, and made it fade out over the course of about 2 seconds.  but it seemed to be its own sort of mass, or ball of light, or something.  there was also absolutely no place for a man-made light to be stationed in the back yard or anywhere down the hill.  the color of the object is also difficult to identify, but not due to my inability to get a perfect look at the light.  i am an artist, and i have recently been working on graphic design projects, illustrations, and video game concept art.  to this day, i can't replicate the color and brightness exactly.  the bright, but deep, blue primary color of the light or object emitting it was so perfect, controlled, and soft, yet strong, i have yet to find an exact blue color to call it.  the way it faded was so smooth, i don't think even a stage light could be a proper re-creation.  it was so inexplicably scary to me, but now i find it a little fascinating.

i lived in that house for another five years before moving for college at 17, the back yard grading was finished, and nothing strange happened on that property ever again.  we still own the property today.  however, i was greatly affected by this psychologically.  i still have a fear of being abducted or observed, or even seeing something again.  my mother jokes that i stay up all night because i'm a college student, but i do it to make sure at least she is awake to get me if there is another ufo close to the house.  or, at least i will be awake if something was to happen in the middle of the night.  regardless, i definitely believe in the existence of ufos and extraterrestrials after that night.
content.summary: I witnessed what seemed to be a bright blue light in my back yard, which slowly faded into itself.  seen from inside the house.

content.detailedDescription:
Been watching hanger 1, thought i should share what i witnessed 1 night. 

me and friends went down to lbi for a week, one night (100% sober night) i was relaxing on the beach listening to the waves. all of a sudden this bright light shows up in the distance over the atlantic ocean. i figure it was a boat, but now it's the only thing i see so i keep looking at the light. suddenly it shots across the horizon really really fast, from my vantage point i had to turn my head to keep watching it, so it must've traveled miles in seconds! then it abruptly stops, seems to move very slightly from side to side, then just rockets directly straight up! once it hit the sky, almost looking straight up at this point, it disappeared. a few minutes later i see more lights, but these look like actual boats trying to follow the path of the object. after about 10 min the boat lights disappear and that's the last i saw.
content.summary: Ufo over the atlantic ocean.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside playing and felt compelled to look up i seen a silver metallic diamond shape object blinking lights hovering 7-8 hundred feet above not moving at all no noise. hovered long enough for me to run in my house a get my mother, the three of us watched it for a couple more min then it suddenly made a zig zag move and was gone, it moved faster than i've ever seen anything thing move then and since. i wasn't scared i felt like i was suppose to see it strangely i've never been able to get it of of my mind. i think i have some type of special mental abilities not sure how it all works? i wish i could see it again...
content.summary: Seen ufo hovering and then made radical movements zig zag  then gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on my back in my bedroom a window behind me was where i saw the spaceship going cross the house going from east to west. shaped like a boomarang, no plain can go that slow & quiet.
after it cleared my view i knew that it was a ufo.(& i knew if anyone not only saw it or heard my story...... what can be done about it?
so what..... i mean they have this high technology better then us earthlings, if they wanted us dead..... they would have done us in many years ago.....!!!
afraid? ⏩not even a little.
   i would give anything to talk with them!!!
mr. jay (杰伊)
content.summary: Florescent white, about 35 mph,

content.detailedDescription: At the time i worked for a small pizza place and i delivered. there business hours for delivery were late til 3am, so i was on a delivery around 1am with my at the time girlfriend now wife(yes the pizza place allowed riders with us). i was on my way to a delivery (i must note that i've been delivering in this area for years and know it well) while heading east on cranston rd. just past some rail road tracks, when 3 red lights caught my eye north of me, i turned to my wife and said "oh look they added another cell tower hope it's my carrier" and went on to my delivery which was a block south of the "new tower".  i got out of car went up to house and knocked, so while i was waiting  i looked towards the "tower" and the three lights were in a different spot about fifty feet east of were i first saw them. the customer comes to door and i wanted to  get the money fast and get out of there to see what those lights are, so i ran to car and tell wife "look those three lights moved" she said "i thought it was a tower" i say "thought it was, must be a helicopter" so i kept watching it from my car and headed north towards it above a school on cranston rd. i pull on to craston to get closer,i got to where it was slightly at an angle above head just above the school across the street from me and i can see it was a black hovering triangle the three red lights that were solid at the ends of the triangle on the bottom of ufo. i told my wife" it's a ufo" she was looking at it not saying anything. it was cold out i had my windows up but decided i needed to hear if there were any sounds so i rolled it down and nothing, wasn't enough for me so i open my door and my wife said "no" i said "i got to know" so i got out and it moved to the right very slowly to a stop as i watched was looking for signs of anything that would be a normal airship, the it moved up ,then down,then left as if they knew i was looking for our technology, like they were saying hey look we move in impossible ways. no sound at all, moved in ways that seemed impossible.I stood there for about 3 mins watching it then it started heading south east so i jumped back in car and followed till it went behind a tree line i lost sight, then i see it zoom straight up so fast that it felt like a blink of an eye and gone. i'm reporting this now because i didn't know who to report it to til today. i saw your show on the history channel, and that's my ufo story. i will never forget it and would love to have more encounters
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangle three red lights no sound

content.detailedDescription: Me and two buddies were 16 years old we were out late one night at an old church in salem oregon were sitting there drinking beer it was saw a star in the sky moving it's slowly made its way down towards us and all the sudden it was right on top of us are one of my friends started freaking out screaming do you see that do you see that can you see thatand within one second of my buddy freaking out on this aberration it was gone instantly just disappeared you could see it leaving what it just turned into a pinpoint in the sky and disappeared
content.summary: It came right down on us watched us for a couple minutes my buddy freaked out yelling and it left without a trace or sound

content.detailedDescription: The event took place in the summer of 1975. it was late at night and i was laying in a hammock in my backyard when i observed three triangular shaped vehicles over head. they made no noise and the center of each craft was dark but the edges were light with a soft bluish light. as i observed the vehicles, the one on the right left the formation. it exited 90 degree to the direction that the others leaving in a streak of light. it instantly disappeared from view. i continued to watch the two remaining vehicles. about 10 to 15 seconds later, the vehicle that left returned. it returned in streaks of light and was suddenly in formation again. they flew in formation for a few more seconds before leaving to the east. they accelerated leaving streaks of light and were instantly gone from view.
content.summary: Three triangular shaped craft flying in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was on side walk walking then friend said look something strange in the sky in the back of cemetery ( next to school "will make sense") , i had a look then said it a star or something and he said no its moving from one side to the other after 1-2 mins we realise that it was getting closer after a other minute or so it was flying just under the tree tops from the school limits it went up over the tree and came toward us over the street just a bit higher then the streets light and stop. i was trying to see what it look liked but i couldn't see cause the light was to strong, so me and my friend started to jump and scream at it. after it started to move forward toward us we got scared and ran 2-3 meters and stop and looked back to see it stop and turn around and leave toward the cemetery until we couldn't see it any more.

p.S 2-3 cars went by on the street one of the driver was looking it and didn't seemed to understand what was going on bit no one stop.

( i speak french and english isn't my main language so sorry for the spelling errors )
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw it from far then came close stop then left

content.detailedDescription:
i had just walked out on my deck at the time when i lived at ranch trail near emmitsburg md. and looked in the direction of emmitsburg and saw this huge v-shaped object coming from the east directly from the emmitsburg area with deep blue colored lights slowly pulsing acrossed the front of it,it was at approx.Between 8&9pm. and getting dark out.
 it was moving at a very speed with no sound coming from it whatsoever and just before it got over me it turned with a slow solid motion to the right from my stand point which would be in a southern direction and with no speed change went over the woods line out of sight.It seemed like forever but was over in about 2 minutes.This thing did not make a bank when it turned a 45 degree turn from east to south,it stayed as level as a straight edge.
 about no more than another 2 minutes later i heard a loud roaring and here comes 2 military cargo style planes "4 props each with the large underbellys" coming from the exact direction from emmitsburg area.They were low into the tree line just as the thing i saw was.One continued straight west and the other plane banked north around tiger trail and ski liberty mountains.He was laying over sharply to make the turn and huggin the mountain top.He made a complete circle around the two mountain tops and then came back in the same eastern direction and went straight west as the first plane did?
 the object turned south,it was like they were trying to follow it but it ditched them so easy it was actually funny.
 this thing was huge,it was as wide as the clearing coming up through the valley of route 16 and it was just above the tree tops,just high enough to clear the trees.
 this thing was a magnificent thing to see. 
 i have had other sightings"with witness's"that i have had that i'd like to tell you about.Never have said to much about them at one time to anyone as they'ed think i'm probably nuts,but most of them has been with other people with me that saw them also and i can produce them all but my dad who has passed.I'll just say i've seen enough to say that anyone who thinks we're the only one's are so sadly mistaken.
content.summary: Large"huge" v-wing craft with pulsing deep blue light acrossed front

content.detailedDescription: Approx 3am. driving on i-10 fwy at approx 70mph.No one else on hwy. noticed lights in my rear following,keeping distance. further inspection observed 2 lights,one on top of the other in the middle. green and white lights. smaller red lights attached to a wing. when i pulled over and looked out my door at it,it kept the 100 yard distance,just hovering.I could see the white light on the pavement in front of it. it seamed to communicate with me. i had spoken to some friends earlier that i would love to see a ufo. this thing somehow said"well you wanted to see a ufo,so here i am" in my head. i have never been so scared in my life! i spead off,getting off the next offramp. never saw it again.
content.summary: Small craft 5feet above ground followed my car keeping 100 yard distance

content.detailedDescription: In cygnus the swan light looked like star started getting very bright and danced then faded out.
content.summary: In cygnus the swan light looked like star started getting very bright and danced then faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of this sighting i was working at the mauna kea visitor's station (officially named the onizuka center for international astronomy on mauna kea), and setting up telescopes for public viewing.  a visitor asked me what the bright light was in the sky, at that point just above one of the local hills, perhaps 20 degrees from the horizon.  since no stars or planets were in that part of the sky at that time, i said "i don't know, lets keep watching it".  

just a few seconds after that, the craft made a very subtle "s" turn as it moved towards us.  at that point i knew it was something different, so i grabbed one of the 14" telescopes, and as it traveled higher in the sky, i was able to see it two of three tries in the telescope.  it looked like an equilateral triangle with a white light on each point.  the lights were bright enough to illuminate the edges of the craft which were very strait lines.  i hate to use popular media as a reference, but it looked like the craft that is seen in the first episode (or second) of the x-files.

to the naked eye, it was just reflecting sun light and looked like it could have been the iss in brightness.  as it traveled to the ne, it faded from view, i presume entering earth's shadow around 60-70 degrees above the horizon.  using all that information, and taking the best guess of apparent size in the eye piece that it was 20 meters across.  my training is in astronomy so while challenging, that kind of math doesn't scare me.

worth noting that the visitor center has no street address, i'm not trying to be difficult about that.
content.summary: Started looking like bright star at twilight, but moved in a "s" curve on the sky, then traveled overhead and faded into earth's shadow.

content.detailedDescription: It was regular summer day in mississippi, that's where i would spend my summers. my family an i would come down from chicago,an stay the summer with my grandparents. it was towards the end of the summer, i had just got through cutting grass, my mother an cousin was on the front lawn. we were looking at the sky, because it was pretty, like when its pink and pearly looking before the sun goes' down. that's when we saw a frisbee looking ship n the sky. it's was sitting over a field, hovering with no sound. it was not to far away. it looked like sliver an chrome moving water, going round and round hovering. it stayed in one place for about 3 to 4 minutes then it took off. to the other end of the field. i moved so fast that it was still where it took off. it moved like the cartoon the flash. it made 30 to 40 other ships in motion when it took off. then it stopped an went back to the same place. then it took back off the same super sonic fast and , what looked like it exploded then it was gone. into some type of time portal. we new what it was from watching unsolved mysterys an other show's. it was amazing to see something like that. i can say after that experience, i ben having alot of paranormal experience since then. i always think about it.Years later i would have the most unexplained dream that seem so real.That i was in a space ship hovering over mu grandma house, in the exact same place, but i was in the ship look at my self. i can remember every detail of the ship an what type of clothes i had on.
content.summary: I observed a frisbee look ship sitting in the sky, looking like sliver chrome, then it took off like the cartoon flash. it moved so  fast that it was still at the same place,where it took office when it took off

content.detailedDescription:
Im and aircraft structural mechanic stationed at naval air station jacksoneville.  one night after the at's got done working on the flir pod those of use working out there would play with it.  when i started to play with it the thing we do is pan the airbase and zoom in on the hangers.  its a fun toy.  as i focused on the hanger i noticed on the flight line a dark object saucer shaped totally black hovering over the base low treetop level.  i watched it for a few minutes about 15 mins to be close to actual time.  then it moved and went straight up and was gone.  when i tried to report it a major storm came done on top of me and i was told not to say a thing and drop it.  so i did and spoke no more of it.  

some months later i saw a ufo again.  this time it was lit up and flew fast over the base then changed directions at right angles and was gone. whole thing took a few seconds.  i made no attempt to report that one.

my third experience took place when i was out of the navy and in my semi driving.  i was lost on a two lane highway on top of a mountain at night. i think was in maryland and i saw a light in the distance.  i was stopped on the side of the road on my gps trying to find out where i was the gps was not locating me position and the qualicom directions were giving the wrong directions to my stop.  in short i was lost.  i was on the qualicom joking that i see a ufo, then to my surprise the light i thought was a helicopter ended up being a actual ufo and it lit up my truck for about 5 mins then went away.  this event should be in the qualicom record because i remember talking about it on the qaulicom with dispatch.

the last sighting i had was in georgia at night; i was at a rest stop resting and looking in the sky when i saw two aircraft flying the light radiation from the near by city was lighting up the bottom of the aircraft and i noticed they were boomerang shaped a pair of them flying in formation.  the had marker lights and three white lights large light circle under it wing tips and center.  those i thing are military aircraft.  but in all my time with aircraft i never saw these before.  i have touched a f-117 and seen many top secrete aircraft fly but i have never seen these land near me.  those are my stories my health is not to good and i don't know how long i will live or if i will get better.  i don't want anything other than to help your investigations i hope these can help you.
content.summary: I was stationed at nas jax when i saw it on the flir pod.  dont remember exact date but not my first ufo sighting there either.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were hunting antelope in a large mountainous area. i didn't notice the object until we arrived at home and saw it in a picture. a ufo. i was very frightened and didn't know what to do.
content.summary: Being where i was there is no possibility that this could be a plane or other factor

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were on the roof of my house star gazing very clear night.And from the east we saw the stars being blocked out by a moving object as it got over head shape and size (hard to tell altitude) became apparent. but i can say this about the size it was at least two or three fists held arms length wide. it blocked out a swath of stars.We did not know what to think of it at the time we got excited went down and told my mother we were not, to say shook up but excited.Over the years thinking about it i assumed it was military considering we were next to lackland air force base in san antonio, but now i know it could not have been. when we saw it we watched it move from east to west at a steady rate slowly over head then the stars came back as it went out of sight guessing twenty to thirty degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Was star gazing with a friend and and an object drifted over head from east to west was blocking  out the stars some very dark features apparent. no sound no lights just blocked out a swath of the stars. very clear skies no clouds before or after,

content.detailedDescription: I was in basic training in fort lenordwood  mo.Army base in november of 1979 i remember because it was around thanksgiving and me and my partner were on guard duty in a place that the drill sargent called the million dollar hole in was a open pit mine not sure what they mined there. i think it was for training the heavy equipment operators for graders. me and my partner were just talking about i looked out the guard shack and seen these cigar or spear shaped things moving really eratic in the sky over the pit mine. there were about 4-5 of them and they had like flutuating lights that were green ,red and orange and the lights were moving on the cigar shaped things like the band on both ends. and we could not believe how fast they were moving. and i remember that if i moved towards them they would come closer to me. it was just unreal. we were both freaked out. but we knew that if we reported them we would be put in the looney bin hospital. so that why we never reported them and we knew that they were not jets or anything of this planet. thats about all i can remember. hope it helps ps these things were in a deep pit mine so we knew that they couldn't be seen on radar
content.summary: Flying cigars or spears jerking around.

content.detailedDescription:
Just another day going to work in poteet ,tx, always drove on highway 16. its about 515 am,just passed 1604 and highway is completely dark away from all city lights or street lights,drinking coffee and listening to radio, all i see is car head lights in front on road, when all of a sudden there appears this bright white light around my car, i say the light must have been about 50ft all around my car, and the light was moving as my car was going about 55 miles an hour, i turned radio off and i was scared,suddenly i could not hear or feel the car tires on the road, i felt the car being lifted off the road, the car felt like it was floating a few feet above the road, at this time i became very scared, so i started blowing the horn after a few minutes the car came back down and made contact with the road, i saw this very large round object shining in a silver colored light moving in front and above my car and still beaming the light on the road, i than saw it shut down the beam of light and started going up and flew east until it disappeared,a few weeks after this happened i started having dreams of being in places i have never been to,about a month later i noticed two lumps in left arm and smaller lumps in my right arm. now when im home i wake every morning about 3am or 4am and i have to go outside and stare at the night sky, i do not know why i do this, wife says i going crazy .
thanks for letting me write about my experience .
content.summary: Driving to work object hovered above my car beaming light on car and surrounding area,

content.detailedDescription: Well it was a very nice day and i was out rideing my mountain bike back and forth in front of my place i had planted some realy beutiful wild flowers and was apreciating them rideing back and forth and heard a jet going buy up above so i stoped just for second to take a quik look and see the airliner flying by way up there and to the side much lower i see what looked like a bird rafting back and forth and it was so high up there it would disapear and come back , i had never seen a bird raft so high before,so i was watching it and watching it and all of a sudden it takes a dive like a hawk would and just then im say to my self thats not a bird and its down to tree top level behind my place over the creek be hind me and thers so much heet comeing off the thing it looks like the craft is changeing its shape it moves along at about maybe 50 miles a hour it pulled it nose up a little bit and a stream of vapor came out of the left side of its beak like nose it turned right and just disapeared .Poof gone with out any sound at all.And thats it . it looked wedg like and charcole in coler. i dident get any pictures but i can draw a ruff drawing.
content.summary: I thought it was bird circlying way up there and all of a sudden it makes a dive like a hawk and i say to my self thats not a bird it droped down to tree top behind my place.

content.detailedDescription:
i was in my room in bed just waking up: i was laying on my back with my head on a pillow, then i opened my eyes and i was petrified when i saw the alien form hovering in the upper left corner on the other end of the room intently super focused, staring motionless and piercing force fully straight through every fiber of my being, leaving me stunned and unable to move, or even process any thought except to know that i was terrified and in a helpless unforgiving state of instant panic with nowhere to run or hide.
   it didn't hit me as a thought on the instant,or during our encounter, but i somehow knew exactly where it came from, and it was not of this earth.
    i instantly was in a deep state of terror, and frozen in place unable it seemed to even process a thought to jump up and flee the situation for an undetermined amount of time except to say that it felt like at least 20-30 minutes. it was only after that amount i suddenly spark a thought and leaped out of bed like a bolt of lightening, and ran straight to my mom's room and shook her frantically begging for her to wake up and come see what was there. i lost sight of it when i ran out of my room.
    there's a lot more to the story, and i would like to speak to someone like an investigator about it if i could. if there's any info that you people might be able to provide me with concerning any sort of identification, or similarity with other known beings of it's kind recorded in your archives, or any similar stories i could learn about i think that would do a lot to sooth my soul, or give me some sort of closure.
    i've always wondered if there was some way i could meet with a hypnotist, because i"m sure i could draw it from memory if i was put under, especially knowing that i am pretty good at sketching things already. i 'm sure i could make an exact replication if taken beac into my past with a professional as such. 
    it's always frustrated me how vividly i can remember the thing but never was able to accurately sketch it the exact way it looked. it still haunts my mind and spirit to this day. i've always had the need to contact someone, not really having any idea who until i saw hanger 1 alien files, on cable tonight. 
    i'm sincerely hoping i can connect with someone who really cares, or has a need to know what happened on that one fateful morning.
    please help me if you can, this has been with me forever, and talking to a psyche about it, or anyone else for that matter, has always left me feeling empty and alone, and actually feeling like a fool really, because i don't get the sense anyone has understood just exactly where i was coming from when shared at any given point in life. how do you expect to get a normal person to understand something that sounds so surreal?
    anyway, thank you for taking the time to read what i have written, it would mean the world to me to finally speak with someone dedicated to this particular field.

    thank you for taking the time to read what i have written in my letter to you.

                 sincerely,     james "byron" hart
content.summary: Shocked to see an alien staring me down ("face to face") one on one...

content.detailedDescription: I have video of this two events, i first came out of my apartment downstairs went up to the other apartment upstairs i  saw 3 red probes going in a straight line east of the house, going very slow(i have the video of the first encounter and the second encounter) north of the house this time there were like 19 of these red probes coming out of space(50 to 60,000 feet away) down and and make a formation straight across and some of them would just stop watch the other approach and pass and then go right behind, people celebrating the three kings, i've posted it on 'youtube' under frank muniz , please check it out. i still have the footage on my iphone,thank you
content.summary: Red spears

content.detailedDescription: Got out of car to go into randhurst mall in wheeling illionis. noticed something in the sky. me my wife my daughter and my son all seen it. a cylinder shaped ufo. i bent down to show my daughter in the stroller and the others seen it shoot up into space. i know people don't believe but 4 of us seen it. it was real.
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i have had multiple objects in the past several days that have been coming from many directions, they would first come as a bright and glowing light some brighter than others and would ascend higher and then turn into a starlike object and sit there also we have seen multiple objects in a v-like shape that hover for a long period of time and then disappear or fade away.
content.summary: Had multiple craft from multiple directions show up on several nights in a row that hover and transform into to different objects

content.detailedDescription: Lived in two story house, blinds pulled up.  i was standing up looking out window when i seen this red ball come over the house descented about tree level traveled across the street and then flew up and over the house across the street and disappear into the night.  i ran down stairs, told  my room mate to come outside because i just seen something that was amazing.  she wanted to know what it was. i told her it was a red ball that came over the house than shot over the house across the street. i went outside because i thought something might be following it.  i stay outside about a half hour, but, nothing.  i was excited and scared at the same time.  it did remind me of something i seen years before.  in 2013 i seen something at night in the sky,  about 11:00 pm in fullerton, ca.  where i now live, it was a white light traveling north.  it had no flashing light like a plane, just a white dot going across the sky.  as i was following it i notice this wave like thing waving like a flag, however it was clear but i could see the sky waving where it was at, almost square like.  when the light came to it both the light and the object disappeared.  it seem like it was a mother ship waiting for the other craft to arrive so they could depart, which they did.  i told my family but they said i was crazy.
content.summary: Seen red ball come over house, descend about tree level than go over house across street

content.detailedDescription: I was 8 reflective liquid like sphere went over my neighbors house at tree top level it didn't make a sound. it was floating casual glide. i pointed it out to my friend across the street and then it started to move up but still floating. we followed it on our bikes till we ran out of road and found our selves on a large hill made by construction companies for new homes. at that point the craft was very high in the sky where it joined or we could see 3 objects in a triangular formation they stopped for a second and started down again then they moved in a slight rotation and started floating away and up again and in an instant they shot up into the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was 8 reflective liquid like sphere went over my neighbors house at tree top level

content.detailedDescription: When i was younger i was very sick me and my family were in oak cliff tx outside of dallas. i had chicken pox very bad to where it was in my brain and had to teach myself to walk again. i had a alot of brain problems after. doctors said id probably be okay. not really knowing what to do. my mom was working late and my dad let me stay in the living room so my sister wouldnt get sick. i was watching t.V. waiting on my mom to get home when the t.V. started going crazy. just static.  i turned it off so i didnt wake my dad. i saw a bright light with a blue tint come threw the window. i went out thinking my mom was back and saw a craft on the ground. i never saw something like this before. i felt almost like i had to go and see it. i walked over and it was making a buzzing noies. and i was greeted by a small gray man. it sounded like my voice in my head telling me id be okay. so i held its hand. it was cold. but warm outside. i remember being showed around. it was very nice and calm. i asked for its name. it said something strange. i told it mine. and told it my feet were cold. the floor was silver and felt like medal. there were others. they checked me out and gave me something that made me tired. when i woke up i was tucked in. in my living room. the tree limbs outside were bent and broken. i realized i didnt stutter as bad or feel so slow. i felt better. i don't knowif they did something to me but i felt safe. and i remember the way its hand felt. i remember everything very vividly. i was little. but i know how i felt and i think it did help me. i tried telling my mom about it. but me being so little she never believed me. and me telling her it looked like a shiny frizby didn't help. i just want people to know if they ever see an alien to not be scared. it held my hand as a kid and told me id be okay. and it helped me. it even smiled at me. its eyes were like a dark green almost! it wasn't pure black like people say. the only people i told this story to was my mom abit. my soon to be husband. and now you. just know from this. they are not all bad.
content.summary: It has been about 20 years but i still remember.
